A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a movie\, it was very enjoyable. As a Star Wars movie\, WTH?! I completely understand wanting to open up the franchise to new possible directions\, but this was a terrible way to do it. Star Wars is still a phenomenon today BECAUSE OF its original storyline and characters. This movie attempts to tear that down in order to move in a different direction rather than build from it to do the same thing. Disney\, why build a whole new theme park based on what we love\, if you’re just burning down what we love in order to move in a new direction?
